Pre-Game Insights: The Indian team, led by Suryakumar Yadav, aims to continue their winning streak against Sri Lanka in the T20I series starting July 27, 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series marks a new era for Indian cricket with the retirement of key players and a new coaching setup.
Others: The article mentions the head-to-head statistics between Sri Lanka and India in T20Is.
